YUZU:CriticalHitRate.NAME: Critical Hit Rate
DESCRIPTIONS: Crit Rate %d.

YUZU:CriticalHit.NAME: Crit
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b%d #yAttack deals #b%d%% damage.

YUZU:JobResponsibilitiesPower.NAME: Job Responsibilities
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yMastered Strike and Defend, play #b%d more times.

BATwinsMod:BurnPower.NAME: 灼伤
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合结束时，造成
点伤害，然后层数减1。死亡时对其他敌人造成等同于层数2倍的伤害。

YUZU:AimingPreparationMasterPower.NAME: Aiming Preparation: Master
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yMastered card, fill #b%d #yCrit #ySlot.

YUZU:PreparationPower.NAME: Aiming Preparation
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, fill #b%d #yCrit #ySlot.

YUZU:AnalysisPower.NAME: Analysis
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, #yMaster all cards of the same type. Whenever you play a #yMastered card, #rExhaust it.

YUZU:BlockOnDamage.NAME: Block On Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: When you lose HP, gain #b%d Block.

YUZU:BlurOnDamage.NAME: Block On Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: When you lose HP, gain #b%d Blur.

YUZU:CurlUpPower.NAME: Curl
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b%d #yIronBox into your hand.

YUZU:FlameModulePower.NAME: 火焰模块
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时，给予所有敌人%d层燃烧。

YUZU:ImagePower.NAME: Straw Doll
DESCRIPTIONS: When Temp_HP is broken, escape from non-Boss combats.

YUZU:PaintingsPower.NAME: Sky Painting
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, after drawing, gain [E] equals to #b%d times the number of card types in your hand.

YUZU:PreheatPower.NAME: Preheat
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase #b%d%% #rCrit damage, removed after losing HP.

YUZU:ProperPlanningPower.NAME: Plan
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, choose #b%d cards to get #yRetain.

YUZU:VulturesEye.NAME: Vultures Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: The #yCrit #ySlot requirement is changed to #b%d.

YUZU:BurningPower.NAME: 燃烧
DESCRIPTIONS: 在回合开始时受到%d点伤害，并降低1层。每有10层燃烧，伤害翻倍。

YUZU:ExtraCriticalRatePower.NAME: Extra Crit
DESCRIPTIONS: #Increase #b%d%% #rCrit damage.

YUZU:ImpactWarheadPower.NAME: Impact Warhead
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever #rCrit, draw #b%d cards.

YUZU:BlastPower.NAME: 燃焰爆破
DESCRIPTIONS: 每打出一次暴击后使燃烧的基础数值提高%d。

YUZU:FortressPower.NAME: Fortress
DESCRIPTIONS: You can't Crit at this combat.

YUZU:ReduceDrawPower.NAME: Draw Reduce
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b%d less cards next turn.

YUZU:LoseEnergyNextTurnPower.NAME: Energy Reduce
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d less energys next turn.

YUZU:MagazineFillingPower.NAME: Magazine Fill
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, each #yRetained card fills #b%d #yCrit #ySlot.

YUZU:GamingFieldPower.NAME: Gaming Field
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a not #yMasterd card, gain #b%d Block.

YUZU:FinallyHope.NAME: Final Hope
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, start a new turn. At the start of that turn, gain less #b%d energy, draw less #b%d.

YUZU:GlowBlessingPower.NAME: Glow Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: You will not lose HP and negates any debuff, last for #b%d turns.

YUZU:VigorMonster.NAME: Monster Vigor
DESCRIPTIONS: Next Attack deals #b%d additional damage.

YUZU:ShanhaiPower.NAME: PaiShanDaoHai
DESCRIPTIONS: Strength affects extra times equals to the cost of #yAttack.
